title: Allstars.gg League of Legends Division Announcement
body:
ALLSTARS are proud to announce our first addition to our League of Legends roster! 

The core team is as follows: 
Top: Josh "Copycat" Cremasco
Jungle: Jason "Vanish" Sfak
Mid: Hugh "Thydah" Nicolson
ADC: Jacky "Enyav" Joe 
Support: Jasper "Support" Jo. 

These players also have some great help from Coach Phillip "Diamond" Phan and Analyst Chris "Stronk" Chew.

Allstars are very happy to have Incontrol come on board, they already have great aims set, and we've been very eager to start the journey together to achieve those goals. We will be actively following their progress in the League of Legends scene, keeping all of our followers updated along the way.

If you would like to follow this team and their journey, head over to our Facebook and Twitter pages linked below. We will be giving everyone the opportunity to learn more about the roster in the coming weeks.

[Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/allstarsgg](https://www.facebook.com/allstarsgg)
[Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/allstarsgg](https://www.twitter.com/allstarsgg)

Thanks again for all the support, it doesn't go unnoticed and we will be giving back soon. In the meantime we wish everyone good luck with the start of the 2016 season.
